question: The name of the cricketer who was world's top-ranked One-day batsman in the latest ICC ODI rankings is?
explanation: India captain Virat Kohli continues to top the ICC One-Day International rankings. In the latest rankings released by the game's governing body Kohli tops the list of batsmen with 873 points. Kohli who has a 12-point lead over second placed Aussie opener David Warner, will look to enhance their position. As for the ICC ODI Team Rankings, India are currently at number three with 114 points and they would have to win the upcoming series at least by a 4-1 margin to ensure that they stay at that position, ahead of England.
